summary: Test module that validates the SHAP explanation pipeline of the Diffusers library, providing both lightweight unit tests with mocked components and full integration tests to verify inference, batching, precision handling, model saving/loading, CPU offload, and correct SHAP value generation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the SHAP explanation feature in diffusion-based models, ensuring reliable performance across different hardware setups and configurations before deployment.
